name: oscar-ui
description: Logiciel de gestion de l'activit√© de recherche

scripts.build-activitydocument: node node_modules/.bin/vue-cli-service build --name ActivityDocument --dest ../public/js/oscar/dist --no-clean --formats umd,umd-min --target lib src/ActivityDocument.vue
scripts.watch-activitydocument: node node_modules/.bin/vue-cli-service serve --name ActivityDocument --dest ../public/js/oscar/dist --no-clean --formats umd,umd-min --target lib src/ActivityDocument.vue
